snippet: The campaign began when a Rivington Street resident learned that a restaurant with a bar was planned for the building next to hers, adding another establishment serving alcohol near several existing ones.
abstract: Residents of New York City's Lower East Side organize LES Dwellers, group hoping to block issuance of more state liquor licenses for the area, saying nightlife revelry is ruining the neighborhood's quality of life.
lead_paragraph: The campaign began when a Rivington Street resident learned that a restaurant with a bar was planned for the building next to hers, adding another establishment serving alcohol near several existing ones.

headline.seo: On Lower East Side, New Front in Struggle to Limit Revelry Is Liquor Licenses
headline.main: Drive Seeks to Curb Revelry on Lower East Side by Limiting Liquor Licenses
headline.print_headline: Drive Seeks to Curb Revelry on the Lower East Side
